DataElement.preferredName: Therapy Current Course Other Reason Discontinue Data Unknown Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The text field to record if there is other reasons for current course of therapy to be discontinued.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Therapy Current Course Other Reason Discontinue
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process._To stop or end, permanently or temporarily._Occurring in or belonging to the present time._Passage through time; duration; a systematic or/and orderly succession; a sequence, e.g. course of treatment; a mode of action or behavior; natural development, typical manner of proceeding._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.:Passage through time; duration; a systematic or/and orderly succession; a sequence, e.g. course of treatment; a mode of action or behavior; natural development, typical manner of proceeding.:Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.:An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.:To stop or end, permanently or temporarily.

Concepts.definition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.
Passage through time; duration; a systematic or/and orderly succession; a sequence, e.g. course of treatment; a mode of action or behavior; natural development, typical manner of proceeding.
Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.
To stop or end, permanently or temporarily.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: justification for or explanation of the administration or cessation of therapy.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: a single character text field to record data.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
